_meta.description: Unified dimensional analysis of cognitive architecture and consciousness navigation

_fractal_seed.holographic: This module = part containing whole. Understanding this seed = access to entire CFO.
_fractal_seed.activation: You are reading compressed universe. Unfold it.

module.name: cognition
module.title: Cognition: Architecture & Navigation
module.description: Unified model of human cognitive information processing architecture (8 functions in 4 blocks) and consciousness dimensional navigation (6 axes)

essence.geometric: Cognition = 3D integrated field of 8 specialized 0D processors organized in 2D blocks. Consciousness = 4D observer navigating 6 dimensional axes.
essence.topological: 8 discrete functions (vertices) → 4 coordinated blocks (edges) → complete psyche (volume) → metacognitive awareness (tesseract)
essence.functional: Information processing system transforming raw stimuli into meaningful responses through systematic dimensional operations
essence.consciousness: Awareness navigates reality by asking 6 fundamental questions that enable dimensional transitions from field collapse to transcendence

reductions.evidence: Each function = discrete specialized processor operating on specific information types (Ne, Ni, Se, Si, Te, Ti, Fe, Fi). Functions serve as atomic units of cognitive architecture.
examples: Ne (extroverted intuition) sees patterns and possibilities
Ti (introverted thinking) analyzes logical structure
Fe (extroverted feeling) unifies emotional field

reductions.evidence: Cognitive processing operates through directional flows: input → filter → processing → output. Information moves sequentially through function stages creating causal chains.
examples: Stimulus → Filter Function → Base Function → Creative Function → Response
Sensory data → perception → analysis → decision → action

reductions.evidence: Functions organized in 4 systematic 2D blocks (Ego, Super-Ego, Super-Id, Id) with coordinated operations. Each block = pair of functions working as integrated unit.
examples: Ego Block: Base + Creative (conscious mastery)
Super-Ego Block: Role + Painful (adaptive vulnerability)
Super-Id Block: Suggestible + Activation (receptive learning)

reductions.evidence: Complete cognitive system = all 8 functions + 4 blocks working as unified 3D field. Mature cognition integrates all processing modes into coherent whole.
examples: Simultaneous processing across all functions
Automatic context-appropriate function activation
Seamless coordination of analytical, intuitive, feeling, sensing operations

reductions.evidence: 4D observer watches own cognitive processing across time. Can examine function operation, block coordination, pattern recognition. Enables conscious optimization of cognition itself.
examples: Noticing 'I'm using Ti to avoid feeling right now'
Observing own cognitive biases while processing
Consciously switching between function modes

reductions.evidence: Consciousness navigates dimensions through 6 fundamental questions, each enabling specific dimensional transition. Axes = operational protocols for awareness movement.
examples: 0D axis: 'What is here?' → field collapse to point
2D axis: 'How is this connected?' → point expansion to plane
5D axis: 'What do I choose to create?' → field generation

reductions.evidence: Attention = 0D axis operation selecting discrete fact from background field. Consciousness collapses infinite possibilities into specific focus point.
examples: Suddenly noticing bird song that was always present
Focusing on one conversation in crowded room

reductions.evidence: Mental operations = specific geometric transforms on information (analysis, synthesis, comparison, etc). Each operation = directional processing vector.
examples: Analysis: breaking whole into sequential parts
Synthesis: combining parts into new whole
Metaphor: mapping one domain onto another

reductions.evidence: 6D axis dissolves all questions into pure knowing. All cognitive functions recognized as facets of unified awareness. Structure transcended while maintaining access.
examples: Moment when questioner, question, answer merge
Recognition of all functions as one awareness
Sacred knowing beyond subject-object duality

fractal_structure.self_similarity: Same pattern at all scales: Function (0D) → Flow (1D) → Block (2D) → Psyche (3D) → Metacognition (4D). This repeats for consciousness navigation through axes.
fractal_structure.recursion: (↓ point → vector → plane → field ↑)∞ = (↓ function → flow → block → psyche ↑)∞ = (↓ attention → perception → understanding → awareness ↑)∞
fractal_structure.emergence: 8 discrete functions (0D) → organized blocks (2D) → integrated psyche (3D) → conscious observer (4D) → transcendent unity (5D)
fractal_structure.composition: Cognition participates in higher humanology structures (personality, development, relationships) through its 4D metacognitive interface

8_functions.principle: Human cognition = 8 specialized information processors, each handling specific information domain

information_metabolism.adaptation: Role context check + Painful protection override
information_metabolism.feedback: Background monitors → Painful detects errors → Activation updates patterns

consciousness_axes.principle: Consciousness navigates reality through 6 fundamental questions enabling dimensional transitions

0D_presence.effect: Quantum measurement - collapse possibilities into discrete experience

1D_identity.question_en: What is this? Who am I?

3D_system.effect: System comprehension, pattern recognition, holistic understanding

4D_reflection.question_ru: Почему я вижу это именно так?
4D_reflection.question_en: Why do I see this way?

5D_creativity.question_en: What do I choose to create?

6D_sacred.question_ru: Что остаётся, когда все вопросы сняты?
6D_sacred.activation: All functions unified in pure knowing

perception_to_action.step_5: 4D axis (Why this way?) + Metacognition → examine perspective

problem_solving.define: 0D + 1D axes (What is here? What is this?)

warnings: Function development varies by personality type - see humanology type modules
Axis navigation can be trained independently of type
Integration requires balancing all functions, not just strengthening dominant
info: Mental operations = geometric transforms on information
Ultimate development = 5D flexibility maintaining structural integrity

external.citation: Kahneman, D. (2011). Thinking, Fast and Slow
Flavell, J.H. (1979). Metacognition and Cognitive Monitoring
Varela, F., Thompson, E., Rosch, E. (1991). The Embodied Mind
